tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE NFTs (
    nft_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    nft_name VARCHAR(255),
    nft_owner VARCHAR(255),
    nft_creation_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE nfts (nft_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    nft_name VARCHAR(50),
    nft_description TEXT,
    owner_id INT) PRIMARY KEY (nft_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (owner_id) REFERENCES users(user_id);

CREATE TABLE transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    nft_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (nft_id) REFERENCES nfts(nft_id);

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    history_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES transactions(transaction_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id);
